D

Database - Class in com.example.project_part_3.Database_functions
The Database class provides a higher-level API for interacting with Firebase Firestore and Firebase Storage, mainly around User, Event, and Image_datamap objects.
Database(FirebaseFirestore) - Constructor for class com.example.project_part_3.Database_functions.Database
Creates a new Database wrapper using the given FirebaseFirestore instance and a default FirebaseStorage.
